DescriptionData.Title: Snazaroo 12 Color Ultimate Party Pack Palette
DescriptionData.Description:
Snazaroo Ultimate Party Pack is packed with face paints, brushes, sponges and instructions to make face painting an easy and fun event at your next party.
Includes 2 x 2ml Black and White; 8 x 1ml Classic Colors bright yellow, bright red, grass green, orange, royal blue, sky blue, pale pink and dark brown. Plus 2 x Sparkle colors sparkle lilac and sparkle pink. It has 2 x 8ml glitter gels in star dust and silver. Also included are 4 sponges and 2 paint brushes and a step by step instruction guide.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Includes face paints, sponges and brushes
Detailed instructions to get started easily
One of the most popular face paints in the world
